oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Johnson. Capt. Johnson.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Charles L. Blondin, Cincinnati, Ohio
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Johnson. Member of the Thirteenth (13th) Tennessee Union Cavalry or the Thirteenth Regiment, Tennessee Volunteer Cavalry, U.S.A. This unit was involved with the Bridge Burnings in East Tennessee during the Civil War. Taken by Charles L. Blondin, Cincinnati, Ohio.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Military officers; Military uniforms; Photographers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
